languages.text: "Прости меня, {name}. Я знаю, что подвела тебя. Подвела всех... ах-ха, ведь все было так неплохо в начале, да? Ты не пристрелил{mf||а} и не выгнал{mf||а} меня... все, что надо было сделать — держать себя в руках, и мы бы с тобой поладили! Я сама же просрала свой шанс!"

traits.locale_text: "Прости меня, {name}. Я знаю, что подвела тебя. Подвела всех... ах-ха, ведь все было так неплохо в начале, да? Ты не пристрелил{mf||а} и не выгнал{mf||а} меня... все, что надо было сделать — держать себя в руках, и мы бы с тобой поладили! Я сама же просрала свой шанс!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"
languages.original_text: "Прости меня, {name}. Я знаю, что подвела тебя. Подвела всех... ах-ха, ведь все было так неплохо в начале, да? Ты не пристрелил{mf||а} и не выгнал{mf||а} меня... все, что надо было сделать — держать себя в руках, и мы бы с тобой поладили! Я сама же просрала свой шанс!"

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “请原谅我，{name}。我知道，我让你失望了，我让所有人都失望了……但我们之前相处得还不错，不是吗？你没有朝我开枪，也没有让我滚蛋……我本该控制好自己，这样我们两个本可以相处得很好！是我辜负了这个机会！”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我，{name}。我知道，我让你失望了，我让所有人都失望了……但我们之前相处得还不错，不是吗？你没有朝我开枪，也没有让我滚蛋……我本该控制好自己，这样我们两个本可以相处得很好！是我辜负了这个机会！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Discúlpeme, {name}. Sé que le he decepcionado. He decepcionado a todo el mundo... pero empezó bien, ¿verdad? No me disparó ni me expulsó... ¡Solo tenía que mantener el control y nos habríamos llevado bien! ¡He desperdiciado mi oportunidad!».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"

traits.locale_text: «Discúlpeme, {name}. Sé que le he decepcionado. He decepcionado a todo el mundo... pero empezó bien, ¿verdad? No me disparó ni me expulsó... ¡Solo tenía que mantener el control y nos habríamos llevado bien! ¡He desperdiciado mi oportunidad!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「許して、{name}様。あたいはあなたを失望させたわ。みんなを失望させた…最初はうまくやっていたのに。あなたはあたいを撃ったり、追い払ったりしなかった…あたいが自分を制御できていれば、あたい達はうまくやっていけたのに！あたいは自分でチャンスを投げ捨てたのよ！」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"

traits.locale_text: 「許して、{name}様。あたいはあなたを失望させたわ。みんなを失望させた…最初はうまくやっていたのに。あなたはあたいを撃ったり、追い払ったりしなかった…あたいが自分を制御できていれば、あたい達はうまくやっていけたのに！あたいは自分でチャンスを投げ捨てたのよ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, {name}. Ich weiß, ich habe Euch enttäuscht. Ich habe alle enttäuscht ... Aber es hatte gut angefangen, oder? Ihr habt mich nicht erschossen oder weggejagt ... Ich hätte mich nur unter Kontrolle halten müssen, dann wären wir beide bestens miteinander ausgekommen. Ich habe meine Chance vertan!"
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, {name}. Ich weiß, ich habe Euch enttäuscht. Ich habe alle enttäuscht ... Aber es hatte gut angefangen, oder? Ihr habt mich nicht erschossen oder weggejagt ... Ich hätte mich nur unter Kontrolle halten müssen, dann wären wir beide bestens miteinander ausgekommen. Ich habe meine Chance vertan!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, {name}. Vous avez tout lieu de m'en vouloir, au même titre que l'ensemble de l'équipage... Mais les choses avaient plutôt bien commencé, entre nous. Vous ne m'avez pas abattue ou chassée de votre vaisseau... Si seulement j'avais réussi à garder le contrôle, on aurait pu faire une bonne équipe, vous et moi ! J'ai bêtement gâché la chance qui s'offrait à moi ! »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, {name}. Vous avez tout lieu de m'en vouloir, au même titre que l'ensemble de l'équipage... Mais les choses avaient plutôt bien commencé, entre nous. Vous ne m'avez pas abattue ou chassée de votre vaisseau... Si seulement j'avais réussi à garder le contrôle, on aurait pu faire une bonne équipe, vous et moi ! J'ai bêtement gâché la chance qui s'offrait à moi ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Beni affet {name}. Seni yüzüstü bıraktım, biliyorum. Herkesi yüzüstü bıraktım... Fakat her şey iyi başlamıştı, değil mi? Beni vurmadın veya kovmadın... Tek yapmam gereken, kendime hâkim olmaktı. O zaman aramız iyi olacaktı! Şansımı kaybettim!"
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}. I know I let you down. I let everybody down... But it started off well, didn't it? You didn't shoot me or chase me off... All I had to do was keep control of myself and the two of us would have gotten along fine! I threw away my chance!"

traits.locale_text: "Beni affet {name}. Seni yüzüstü bıraktım, biliyorum. Herkesi yüzüstü bıraktım... Fakat her şey iyi başlamıştı, değil mi? Beni vurmadın veya kovmadın... Tek yapmam gereken şey, kendime hakim olmaktı. O zaman aramız iyi olacaktı! Şansımı kaybettim!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
